Assign.description: update a datamodel location with an expression or value.
Assign.title: Assign

AssignTypeDatatype.description:
The assign type that allows for precise manipulation of the datamodel
location.

Types are:
replacechildren (default),
firstchild, lastchild,
previoussibling, nextsibling,
replace, delete,
addattribute
AssignTypeDatatype.title: AssignTypeDatatype

BindingDatatype.description: The binding type in use for the SCXML document.
BindingDatatype.title: BindingDatatype

Datamodel.description: container for one or more `<data>` elements.
Datamodel.title: Datamodel

Donedata.description: payload returned when a `<final>` state is reached.
Donedata.title: Donedata

ExmodeDatatype.description:
Describes the processor execution mode for this document, being either "lax" or
"strict".
ExmodeDatatype.title: ExmodeDatatype

Final.description: marks a terminal state in the machine.
Final.title: Final

Foreach.description: iterate over items within executable content.
Foreach.title: Foreach

Initial.description: starting state within a compound state.
Initial.title: Initial

Invoke.description: run an external process or machine.
Invoke.title: Invoke

Onentry.description: actions performed when entering a state.
Onentry.title: Onentry

Onexit.description: actions performed when leaving a state.
Onexit.title: Onexit

Scxml.description: root element of an SCJSON document.
Scxml.title: Scxml

Transition.description: edge between states triggered by events.
Transition.title: Transition

TransitionTypeDatatype.description: The type of the transition i.e. internal or external.
TransitionTypeDatatype.title: TransitionTypeDatatype
